text: læa hak phwk khea yindi tx sing thi xallxhˌ læa rx sul khxng phraxngkh di hı kæ phwk khea læa klaw wa xallxhˌ nan thrng phx pheiyng kæ rea læw doy thi xallxhˌ ca thrng prathan kæ rea cak khwam kruna khxng phraxngkh læa rx sul khxng phraxngkh (k ca hı dwy) thæ cring dæ xallxhˌ theanan phwk rea pen phu wingwxn khx
